name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bart Halloween Chill Smoke Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a cool Halloween vibe to Chrome with Bart Halloween chill smoke live wallpapers, plus a search bar and quick-access icons.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bart Halloween Chill Smoke Live Wallpaper: Add a Spooky Vibe to Your Chrome Tabs

Embrace a relaxed Halloween vibe with Bart Halloween Chill Smoke Live Wallpaper. This unique Chrome extension features Bart in a spooky, animated Halloween scene with a touch of chilling smoke. Perfect for fans looking to combine iconic characters with seasonal flair in every new tab.

Features:

Animated Halloween Wallpaper: Enjoy a laid-back, Halloween-themed scene of Bart with an eerie, drifting smoke effect.

Google Search Bar: Access Google search seamlessly right from your new tab.

Quick Site Shortcuts: Instantly reach favorite sites with customizable shortcut icons.

Date and Time Display: Stay updated with a stylishly displayed date and time.

With Bart Halloween Chill Smoke Live Wallpaper, every tab brings a touch of Halloween fun and laid-back style to your browsing. This extension combines functionality with a hint of spookiness, creating a unique, festive experience. Whether you’re a Bart fan or love Halloween, it’s the perfect way to keep your tabs both fun and functional.
